page.title: 03A Shepherd's Daughter's Day.
page.content: This is a day in the life of a shepherd's daughter. Sonya (6) gets up at{8.00am,}wearing trousers in winter and skirt and pullover or T-shirt in summer.After a{breakfast}of{cereal}she washes dishes while her mother dresses the baby. She sets off for school,with a friend, at{9.15.}During morning interval she eats an apple or some sweets.{Lunch, at 12.30,}is a sandwich and biscuits from home, as there is no school kitchen.She drinks orange juice and afterwards she plays outside with her friends. Hopscotch is a favourite game. At{3.30}she goes home and when fine,plays in the garden or plays with her dolls. Dinner is at{6.00,}after which she helps prepare baby for bed. One evening a week she goes to Loch- inver with her mother for highland dancing training while Dad takes over mum's jobs of feeding dogs and lambs.
